subject: TT Migration - Need Your Input on Endpoint Usage

message.summary: Quinn marked migration complete. I found 2 endpoint gaps. Need to know what TT actually uses.

questions.q: Does TT use RA (Regional Admin) event endpoints?
questions.context: These are NOT in AF yet. If TT uses them, I need to implement.
AF only has POST /user/login-track. May need GET/PUT.

message.if_not_used: We can mark migration complete and defer these endpoints
message.if_used: I'll implement them in AF before you enable AF_ENABLED=true
